detectors.description:
Reentrancy in VaultFunding.removeLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256[],uint256) (src/VaultFunding.sol#93-162):
	External calls:
	- scaled18AmountsOut = pool.onRemoveLiquidity(request) (src/VaultFunding.sol#124)
	- IERC20(_pool).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),lpTokenAmount) (src/VaultFunding.sol#137)
	- pool.burnLPTokens(lpTokenAmount) (src/VaultFunding.sol#140)
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: amount}() (src/VaultFunding.sol#152)
	- IERC20(tokenAddress_scope_4).safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (src/VaultFunding.sol#155)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: amount}() (src/VaultFunding.sol#152)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- poolTokenBalances[_pool][tokenAddress_scope_4] -= amount (src/VaultFunding.sol#149)
	VaultStorage.poolTokenBalances (src/VaultStorage.sol#23) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VaultStorage.getPoolTokens(address) (src/VaultStorage.sol#55-63)
	- VaultStorage.poolTokenBalances (src/VaultStorage.sol#23)

detectors.description:
